title: Make deathcap build out of two rods
body: When you build deathcap, unless you're ahead, it's almost always after you've got 3 AP items already but this means you don't have enough inventory space for all the components and since you can't get the amp tome you have to wait for like 1700 gold to complete the recipe. It would be great if you could make deathcap build out of two rods since at this point in the game this really helps out with the inventory space problem.

replies.body: This would actually be a great change. Sure having it build out of more tome and wand makes it easier to switch out of,  but pretty much any high ap item has a NLR in it so its not like you wont use it.  Also this would allow for the combine cost to be 1500, 100 gold cheaper than the old NLR.
They already lowered the cost of NLR. Certain items have space-taking build paths for a reason. Very strong items shouldn't be easy/convenient to obtain.
